title: Just Say Yes

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- **During** the game, you may have whatever the fuck you want to happen, happen. The host, obviously, has the authority to veto your request if they declare it too overpowered. You may be alive or dead, and may do this twice per game.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction.**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.

desc:
Post 4755
*Fuck you, I do what I want.*
